Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the @Builder Closet

This is the @Builder Closet. The walls stand tall as stacked, split logs; almost unadorned yet masterful in their simplicity. A pair of leather chairs have been strategically placed in the middle of the room and face a sticky note on the north wall. A small, wooden table separates the chairs from each other and bears a tall table lamp. A cedar door heads west to the foyer; a common greeting place.
The @Builder Closet.

This is the @Builder Closet. The walls stand tall as stacked, split logs; almost unadorned yet masterful in their simplicity. A pair of leather chairs have been strategically placed in the middle of the room and face a sticky note on the north wall. A small, wooden table separates the chairs from each other and bears a tall table lamp. A cedar door heads west to the foyer; a common greeting place.
http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/backstage/staff_build.jpg
the western door
The door to the west was created from a single piece of cedar.
The door to the west was created from a single piece of cedar.
eastern chair

The eastern chair has a large roll-back top, a waterfall of button-tufted leather which cascades downwards to a deeply padded seat and then continues in a single graceful curve until it almost hits the floor. The solid maple wood frame is given a handsome walnut finish. The striated-turned legs lend a touch of elegance. The supple, high grade leather is black with dark brown highlights due to its age. It is definitely an antique that has weathered beautifully over the years. A traditional nailhead trim provides the perfect finishing touch to this magnificent leather chair.

tall, blue table lamp

A tall table lamp stands on the small table that separates the chairs from each other. The lamp was carefully hand-crafted from blue glass and extends upward towards the ceiling with a gradual flare. The luminescence is a cool blue and is cast across the room. {? greaterthan | $(this.details:lamp_1:luminosity) | 1.0 | The lamp is on. [You may 'turn off' the lamp.] | The lamp is off. [You may 'turn on' the lamp.] }

yellow sticky note
The large, yellow sticky note has been planted on the north wall. Strong bold red lettering spells out "How to use the @Build tool". [Try READ NOTE.]
The large, yellow sticky note has been planted on the north wall. Strong bold red lettering spells out "How to use the @Build tool". [Try READ NOTE.]
Start by simply typing @BUILD in order to bring up the window. [To be continued...]
small, wooden table
A small, wooden table separates the chairs from each other and bears a tall table lamp.
